Package org.apache.calcite.sql.validate

Class SqlWithItemTableRef

java.lang.Object
org.apache.calcite.sql.SqlNode
org.apache.calcite.sql.SqlCall
org.apache.calcite.sql.SqlTableRef
org.apache.calcite.sql.validate.SqlWithItemTableRef
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class SqlWithItemTableRef extends SqlTableRef
A SqlWithItemTableRef is a node created during validation for recursive queries which represents a table reference in a WITH RECURSIVE clause.
